properties.name: supmap.properties.app-email
properties.description: Email address used as the sender for all outgoing communication from the application, including notifications, alerts, and system messages.

properties.name: supmap.properties.database-name
properties.description: Name of the MongoDB database used by the application for storing data, collections, and documents.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-password
properties.description: Password credential for authenticating with the Elasticsearch service used for advanced search capabilities.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-url
properties.description: URL endpoint for connecting to the Elasticsearch service that powers search functionality and data indexing.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-username
properties.description: Username credential for authenticating with the Elasticsearch service for secure search operations.

properties.name: supmap.properties.kafka-bootstrap-servers
properties.description: List of host:port pairs for establishing the initial connection to the Kafka cluster for event streaming and messaging.

properties.name: supmap.properties.mail-modified-username
properties.description: Modified username for the email service account, used for SMTP authentication with specific email providers requiring format adjustments.

properties.name: supmap.properties.mail-password
properties.description: Password for authenticating with the SMTP email server to send transactional emails and notifications.

properties.name: supmap.properties.mail-register-confirmation-link
properties.description: URL template for the account confirmation link sent to users via email during the registration process.

properties.name: supmap.properties.jwt-secret
properties.description: Secret key used for signing JWT tokens to ensure their integrity and authenticity in the authentication process.

properties.name: supmap.properties.mongo-uri
properties.description: Connection string URI for connecting to the MongoDB database server, including authentication credentials and connection parameters.
